mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.board_type, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.view_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_LIKE pl WHERE pl.post_id = p.post_id) as like_cnt, u.user_nickname, u.user_id as userId FROM POST p LEFT JOIN USERS u ON p.user_num = u.user_num WHERE p.board_type = 'free' OR p.board_type = 'notice' ORDER BY p.post_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( board_type, user_num, title, content, created_at ) VALUES ( #{boardType}, (SELECT user_num FROM USERS WHERE user_id = #{userId}), #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.user_nickname, u.user_id as userId FROM POST p LEFT JOIN USERS u ON p.user_num = u.user_num WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
